Cli_Description:
Find out more about Corvid at www.wix.com/corvid
The Corvid CLI is used for working with local versions of your Wix sites. Using the CLI you can create new local projects, open a local editor, and pull project updates.
Clone_No_MetasiteId_Error: Could not get site information from <%= url %>
OpenEditor_Already_Connected_Error:
The local Corvid server is already connected to a Local Editor. 
Close the Local Editor and try again.
OpenEditor_Not_Edit_Mode_Error: Local server is not in edit mode.
OpenEditor_No_Editor_Port_Error: Local server did not return an editor port.
OpenEditor_Client_Console_Fatal_Error: There was an error initializing your site. Please try again.
Pull_Already_Connected_Error:
The local Corvid server is already connected to a Local Editor. 
Close the Local Editor and try again.
Pull_Not_Clone_Mode_Error: Local server is not in clone mode.
Pull_No_Editor_Port_Error: Local server did not return an editor port.
Pull_Client_Console_Fatal_Error: There was an error pulling your site. Please try again.
Clone_Command_Complete: Clone complete. Run 'npx corvid open-editor' to edit the local site version.
Clone_Command_Description: Clones a Wix site to your local machine.
OpenEditor_Command_Waiting: Waiting for the Editor to connect
OpenEditor_Command_Description: Opens the Local Editor used to edit a local site.
Pull_Command_Waiting: Waiting for the Editor to connect
Pull_Command_Complete: Pull complete. Run 'npx corvid open-editor' to edit the local site version
Pull_Command_Description: Pulls a local copy of the site.
Pull_Command_Override_Description: Pulled files overwrite existing local site files.
Pull_Command_Move_Description: Creates a snapshot and moves existing local site files before pulling.
Pull_Command_Not_Empty_Red_Log: Project directory already includes site files.
Pull_Command_Not_Empty_Log:
Run either:
  - 'npx corvid pull --move' to create a snapshot of your current project and pull the
    latest revision from the remote repository.
  - 'npx corvid pull --override' to override the local site files with the latest
    revision from the remote repository.
CAN_NOT_CLONE_NON_EMPTY_SITE: Cannot clone into a directory with existing site files.
CAN_NOT_PULL_NON_EMPTY_SITE: Cannot pull into a project that already contains site files.
CAN_NOT_CLONE_NON_WIX_SITE: Project not found. Open the Editor in the project's root folder.
CAN_NOT_PULL_NON_WIX_SITE: Project not found. Pull site files to the project's root folder.
CAN_NOT_EDIT_NON_WIX_SITE: Project not found. Open the Editor in the project's root folder.
BACKUP_FOLDER_EXISTS: Something went wrong during the last save. An old version of your site is stored in .corvid/backup. Consolidate your changes and remove the backup folder.
OLD_FILE_SYSTEM_LAYOUT_NOT_SUPPORTED:
Your local site project was created using an older version of the Corvid CLI. You cannot use this version with your current project.

To work with the new Corvid CLI:
1. Run "npm install --save-dev corvid-cli@<%=oldCliVersion%>" to reinstall the version used to create your project.
2. Run "npx corvid open-editor" to open the Local Editor.
3. Click Push in the Local Editor to push your changes to the Wix remote repository.
4. Close the Local Editor.
5. Run "npm install --save-dev corvid-cli@latest corvid-types" to install the latest version of the Corvid CLI.
6. Run "npx corvid pull --override" to pull your site using the new CLI.
7. Your local project is now set up to work with the new CLI.
Electron_Prompt_Message_Not_Saved: Changes you made may not be saved
